mapper.insert: insert into basic_appmenu (pkid, appid, parentid, name, code, link, linktarget, icon, sortnum, status, createtime,usetype) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linktarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{usetype,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update basic_appmenu set appid = #{appid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linktarget = #{linktarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, usetype = #{usetype,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, appid, parentid, name, code, link, linktarget, icon, sortnum, status, createtime,usetype from basic_appmenu where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select pkid, appid, parentid, name, code, link, linktarget, icon, sortnum, status, createtime,usetype from basic_appmenu
select pkid, appid, parentid, name, code, link, linktarget, icon, sortnum, status, createtime,usetype from basic_appmenu WHERE appid=#{0}
select pkid, appid, parentid, name, code, link, linktarget, icon, sortnum, status, createtime,usetype from basic_appmenu WHERE appid=#{0} and parentid=0
select pkid, appid, parentid, name, code, link, linktarget, icon, sortnum, status, createtime,usetype from basic_appmenu WHERE parentid=#{0}
